wikipedia_page.main: Susan Beaumont (26 February 1936 – 25 February 2020) was an English film actress who enjoyed a relatively brief film career.

response: Alfred Black married the actress and leading West End musical star Roma Beaumont (b. 1913 d. 2001).Portrait of Roma Beaumont painted by Henry Marvell Carr in 1945:  http://www.bonhams.com/auctions/18115/lot/171/ Roma starred in several hit musicals including The Dancing Years,1939, Ivor Novello and Roma Beaumont in The Dancing Years:http://operetta-research-center.org/coward-novello/ Perchance to Dream1945, Ivor Novello and Roma Beaumont in Perchance to Dream: http://www.gettyimages.co.uk/detail/news-photo/ivor-novello-and-roma-beaumont-in-perchance-to-dream-at-the-news-photo/3333311 and in Cinderella at the London Palladium in 1948.Roma Beaumont's obituary in the Daily Telegraph newspaper (retrieved 7 February 2015):https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/obituaries/1324702/Roma-Beaumont.html Alfred and Roma's daughter is the actress Susan Beaumont who appeared in many films throughout the 1950s. Roma Beumont's cousin was the dancer/singer Roma King (b. 1934 d. 2013)Merton Park Stage Star Passes Away (retrieved 12 February 2015:http://www.yourlocalguardian.co.uk/news/10482850.Merton_Park_stage_star_passes_away/ who appeared in several West End musicals including Love from Judy (1952–54), Lilac Time and Summer Song (1954).Roma King obituary, The Stage newspaper (retrieved 9 February 2015):http://www.thestage.co.uk/people/obituaries/2013/06/roma-king/Theatreland: A Journey Through the Heart of London's Theatre by Paul Ibell https://books.google.com/books?id=X3jOBAAAQBAJ&pg=PA155

* Susan Black (1936–2020), British film actress known as Susan Beaumont
The Spaniard's Curse is a 1958 British drama film directed by Ralph Kemplen and starring Tony Wright, Lee Patterson, Michael Hordern, Susan Beaumont and Henry Oscar.

The Man Who Liked Funerals is a 1959 British comedy film starring Leslie Phillips, Susan Beaumont and Bill Fraser. It was directed by David Eady and written by Margot Bennett, Cecily Finn and Joan O'Connor. The film was released in the United Kingdom in January 1959.

On the Run is a 1958 British drama film directed by Ernest Morris and starring Neil McCallum, Susan Beaumont and William Hartnell.BFI.org The screenplay concerns a boxer who becomes romantically involved with a woman.
Web of Suspicion is a 1959 British crime film directed by Max Varnel and starring Philip Friend and Susan Beaumont. It was produced by the Danziger Brothers.Web of Suspicion at BFI
